abstract: Banks had trouble raising money to lend in the aftermath of the sovereign debt crisis, the European Central Bank said.
snippet: Banks had trouble raising money to lend in the aftermath of the sovereign debt crisis, the European Central Bank said.
lead_paragraph: FRANKFURT  Business loans were harder to come by in the second quarter of 2010, the European Central Bank said Wednesday, as banks themselves had trouble raising money to lend to customers.

headline.main: Lending Tightened in 2nd Quarter for Businesses in Europe
headline.print_headline: Lending Tightened in 2nd Quarter for Businesses in Europe
